question: For resistance to Palbociclib in Sarcoma, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Palbociclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Palbociclib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Palbociclib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Palbociclib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Entrectinib')
RETURN

  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Cisplatin')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Vorinostat')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vorinostat'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vorinostat')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Vorinostat')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

RETURN

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Platinum Doublet')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Platinum Doublet'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Platinum Doublet')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Platinum Doublet')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Brigatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Brigatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Brigatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Brigatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Nilotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nilotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Nilotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Alpelisib in Carcinoma Of The Head And Neck, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Alpelisib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alpelisib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alpelisib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Alpelisib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In Acinar Adenocarcinoma Of The Lung, what therapies target genes linked to resistance to Erlotinib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acinar' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Erlotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Asparaginase'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Asparaginase')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Asparaginase')
RETURN

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Cetuximab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cetuximab'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cetuximab')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Cetuximab')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stomach'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Docetaxel')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Pembrolizumab in Cancer, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pembrolizumab')

  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,

question: Find alternative therapies targeting resistance genes for Vismodegib in Basal Cell Neoplasm.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Vismodegib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vismodegib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vismodegib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'basal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Vismodegib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Iodine I-131')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Iodine I-131'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Iodine I-131')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'thyroid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gland' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Iodine I-131')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which treatments target resistance biomarkers for Ponatinib in Chronic Myeloid Leukaemia?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Ponatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ponatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ponatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Ponatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Imatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Trametinib')

  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Tandutinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tandutinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tandutinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Tandutinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Radiation Therapy')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Radiation Therapy'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Radiation Therapy')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Radiation Therapy')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Brigatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Brigatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Brigatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Brigatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Thioguanine in B Lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Thioguanine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Thioguanine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Thioguanine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Thioguanine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Tamibarotene')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tamibarotene'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tamibarotene')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'promyelocytic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Tamibarotene')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
